channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court hacker posted stolen government data on Instagram
item.description: Nicholas Moore pleaded guilty to stealing victims’ information from the Supreme Court and other federal government agencies, and then posting it on hi...

item.title: Smart Plug Guide (2026): When You Should and Shouldn’t Use One
item.description: Smart plugs can add controls to any outlet, but they aren’t perfect for everything. Here’s our guide to using one and which ones to buy.

item.title: From OpenAI’s offices to a deal with Eli Lilly — how Chai Discovery became one of the flashiest names in AI drug development
item.description: The startup has partnered with Eli Lilly and enjoys the backing of some of Silicon Valley's most influential VCs.

item.title: EPA rules that xAI’s natural gas generators were illegally used
item.description: Elon Musk's AI company had installed and operated 35 natural gas turbines without permits, something the EPA now says was illegal.

item.title: ChatGPT users are about to get hit with targeted ads
item.description: OpenAI says that users impacted by the ads will have some control over what they see.

item.title: Why Everyone Is Suddenly in a ‘Very Chinese Time’ in Their Lives
item.description: The viral meme isn’t really about China or actual Chinese people. It's a symbol of what Americans believe their own country has lost.

item.title: Ads Are Coming to ChatGPT. Here’s How They’ll Work
item.description: OpenAI says ads will not influence ChatGPT’s responses, and that it won’t sell user data to advertisers.

item.title: 9 Best Wi-Fi Routers of 2026 for Working, Gaming, and Streaming
item.description: Don’t suffer the buffer. These WIRED-tested home routers will deliver reliable internet across your home, whatever your needs or budget.

item.title: Former USDS Leaders Launch Tech Reform Project to Fix What DOGE Broke
item.description: The plan, which is still in its early stages, is spearheaded by former USDS administrator Mikey Dickerson.

item.title: Trump administration wants tech companies to buy $15B of power plants they may not use
item.description: In an attempt to alleviate rising electricity prices, the White House wants grid operator PJM to hold an auction for new generating capacity, and it w...
